definition: appearance/portrait/picture/government minister/(physics) phase/(literary) to appraise (esp. by scrutinizing physical features)/to read sb's fortune (by physiognomy, palmistry etc)
each other/one another/mutually/fret on the neck of a pipa 琵琶[pi2 pa5] (a fret on the soundboard is called a 品[pin3])

sentences.english: It seems unfair. Except at the margins, there isn't much we can do about physical attractiveness.
sentences.chinese: 似乎老天不太公平，我們不太能改變自己的長相。

sentences.english: "She is what I would call a fine-looking woman, " I said, after a judicial pause.
sentences.chinese: 她是一個我會稱爲長相好看的女人。

sentences.english: There are striking resemblances between the twin brothers.
sentences.chinese: 雙胞胎的長相有驚人的相似之處。

sentences.english: That is what a p-orbital looks like.
At that moment, a horrible looking man entered the pavillion.
sentences.chinese: 這時，有一個長相很嚇人的男人走了過來。

sentences.english: The lion is called the king of animals primarily because of its regal appearance.
sentences.chinese: 獅子被稱爲萬獸之王，主要是因爲它威嚴的長相。

sentences.english: Look, you will know that you are a bag that looks, also can only be used to hold a pen.
sentences.chinese: 瞧你那長相就知道你是一筆袋，也只能用來裝筆了。

sentences.english: He remarked how odd it was to see someone who looks and acts like him.
sentences.chinese: 他說，看到有人長相和舉止都像自己，覺得怪怪的。

sentences.english: Working is like old-time marriage, obviously you got no happiness, but still you have to live with it.
sentences.chinese: 上班就像舊時代的婚姻，明明不幸福，還得長相廝守。

sentences.english: Our Blend has an intense yellow color.
sentences.chinese: 這款長相思霞多麗有着深黃的顏色。

sentences.english: Look especially for its Cabernet Sauvignon and Sauvignon Blanc.
sentences.chinese: 智利的赤霞珠和長相思白葡萄酒特別好。

sentences.english: When people found him, they saw that his looks resembled those of a fox.
sentences.chinese: 當人們發現他時，他們看到他的長相頗似那些狐狸。

sentences.english: Always being together is my greatest happiness.
sentences.chinese: 與你長相廝守，是我最大的幸福。

sentences.english: For a white, Chilean or New Zealand Sauvignon Blanc is a winner.
sentences.chinese: 如果選白葡萄酒，智利或新西蘭的長相思最好。

sentences.english: After a few days, the big egg finally hatched and out came a strange-looking duckling with gray feathers .
sentences.chinese: 幾天後，那顆大蛋終於孵出一隻長相奇怪的灰毛鴨。

sentences.english: I think that moray eels have a sinister appearance.
sentences.chinese: 我覺得海鱔的長相可怖。

definition: attractiveness index (rating of how good-looking sb is)
to believe (sth in relation to oneself)/to regard oneself as/to acknowledge (sth in relation to oneself)/to resign oneself to
pleasing to the eye/nice to look at
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
